text: This chapter modifies, limits, and supercedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. § 7001), but does not modify, limit, or supercede section 101(c) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(c)) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b)).
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-205, see notes following § 19-1501.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 17 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999). See 8A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 19-1517

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
